wikipedia_page.main: Charles Edward Beckwith (12 May 1901 – 23 March 1970) was a British athlete. He competed in the men's shot put at the 1924 Summer Olympics.

response: * John Charles Beckwith (British Army officer) (1789–1862), known as Charles Beckwith, British soldier during the Napoleonic Wars
